Body:
"""
    Check that setting `data` to None uses the puf file
    """
baseline = False
start_year = 2016
reform = {'II_em': {(2017): 10000}}
if os.path.exists(PUF_PATH):
    calc = get_micro_data.get_calculator(baseline, start_year, reform=
        reform, data=PUF_PATH)
    assert calc.array('blind_head').sum() == 0 and calc.array('e00700').sum(
        ) > 0
else:
    with pytest.raises((IOError, ValueError), match='puf.csv'):
        get_micro_data.get_calculator(baseline, start_year, reform=reform,
            records_start_year=CPS_START_YEAR, data=None)
